Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 118th overall pick, by New York in 2017...
Injured on 4/23/2018 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from New York to Chicago on 5/16/2018 (Going to NY: LF Mark Starr. Going to CHI: P Roberto Ortiz, P Samuel Ramos, 2B Richard Zapata)...
Injured on 7/24/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago to Detroit on 3/2/2019 (Going to CHI: C Matias Guglielmo. Going to DET: 2B Richard Zapata)...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/1/2023 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/24/2023 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Injured on 6/27/2023 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/2/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $20,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 5/15/2025, off Benito Medina (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/23/2025, off Brent Krone (CHI)...
